SobreMim.descricao: I am a Software Engineering graduate and full-stack developer at 90 Tecnologia da Informação, with experience in software development working on both frontend and backend in academic and professional projects. I have knowledge of languages such as C#, Java, JavaScript, and PHP, with proficiency in backend technologies such as Spring, .NET Framework, Hibernate, and JPA, and frontend in React. I work with MySQL, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL databases, using JUnit testing and applying good programming practices, including SOLID principles. I am familiar with agile methodologies, especially Scrum.

data.descricao: Atuo desenvolvendo novas funcionalidades e solucionando erros no sistema de orçamento e planejamento de obras, garantindo o bom funcionamento e a eficiência da aplicação.
Atendimento e suporte técnico a usuários, solucionando problemas e garantindo a usabilidade dos sistemas da empresa.

Projetos.descricao: A selection of software and solutions I have developed.
